import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Site } from '@/sites/model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-site', templateUrl: './site.component.html', styleUrls: ['./site.component.scss'], }) export class SiteComponent { @Input({ required: true }) tableData!: ReadonlyArray; }
Site ID POD DC Address City State Zip CustomerName Meter Type Cycle Load Profile Profile Rate Code
{{ data.siteId }} {{ data.pod }} {{ data.dc }} {{ data.address }} {{ data.city }} {{ data.state }} {{ data.zip }} {{ data.customer }} {{ data.meterType }} {{ data.cycle }} {{ data.loadProfile }} {{ data.profile }} {{ data.rateCode }}
